entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 08:19 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
